data.title: HIPAA 164.306 (a) (1) : Validate confidentiality and integrity of PHI
data.phrase:
//Security standards: General rules. (a) General requirements. Covered entities and business associates must do the following: (1) Ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of all electronic protected health information the covered entity or business associate creates, receives, maintains, or transmits.

datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "XDR agent" | fields xdm.observer.*

data.title: HIPAA 164.306 (a) (2): Threat Protection
data.phrase:
//Protect against any reasonably anticipated threats or hazards to the security or integrity of such information.

datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.agent.version contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.version, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.agent.content_version, xdm.source.agent.identifier

data.title: HIPAA 164.306 (a) (3): Protect against information disclosure
data.phrase:
//Protect against any reasonably anticipated uses or disclosures of such information that are not permitted or required under subpart E of this part.

datamodel | filter xdm.auth.privilege_level contains "*" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (1) (i) (A): Identify risks and Vulnerabilities
data.phrase:
//Risk analysis (Required) Conduct an accurate and thorough assessment of the potential risks and vulnerabilities to the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the electronic protected health information

datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter XDM.source.host.os contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.host.os_family

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (1) (i) (B): Reduce risks and Vulnerabilities
data.phrase:
//Risk management (Required). Implement security measures sufficient to reduce risks and vulnerabilities to a reasonable and appropriate level to comply with § 164.306(a).

datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter XDM.source.host.os contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.host.os_family

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (1) (i) (C): Apply sanction policy when members fail to comply
data.phrase:
//Sanction policy (Required). Apply appropriate sanctions against workforce members who fail to comply with the security policies and procedures of the covered entity or business associate.

datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product = "XDR agent"
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*"
| dedup xdm.observer.name
| fields xdm.observer.product , xdm.observer.name, xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.observer.type, xdm.observer.unique_identifier, xdm.observer.vendor, xdm.observer.version, _time

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (1) (i) (D): Regularly review audit logs
data.phrase:
//Information system activity review (Required). Implement procedures to regularly review record of information system activity, such as audit logs, access reports, and security incident tracking reports

datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*" and xdm.network.ip_protocol = "TCP"
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (4) (i) (A): Isolate health care clearinghouse functions
data.phrase:
//Isolating health care clearinghouse functions (Required). If a health care clearinghouse is part of a larger organization, the clearinghouse must implement policies and procedures that protect the electronic protected health information of the clearinghouse from unauthorized access by the larger organization.

datamodel | filter xdm.auth.privilege_level contains "*" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (6) (i): Identify/rspond to known security incidents
data.phrase:
//Response and reporting (Required). Identify and respond to suspected or known security incidents; mitigate, to the extent practicable, harmful effects of security incidents

datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*"
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (7) (i) (A): Data backup plan
data.phrase:
//Data backup plan (Required). Establish and implement procedures to create and maintain retrievable exact copies of electronic protected health information.

datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.product contains "XDR" 
| filter xdm.observer.type = "AGENT_TYPE_REGULAR"
| fields xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.observer.name, xdm.observer.product, xdm.observer.type, xdm.observer.unique_identifier, xdm.observer.vendor, xdm.observer.version

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (7) (i) (B): Data recovery plan
data.phrase:
//Disaster recovery plan (Required). Establish (and implement as needed) procedures to restore any loss of data.

datamodel 
| filter xdm.event.operation contains "REGISTRY" /*Filter for registry events*/
| filter xdm.event.operation contains "*"
| fields _time, xdm.event.type, xdm.event.operation, xdm.event.operation_sub_type, xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.source.process.name, xdm.source.process.executable.path, xdm.event.outcome, xdm.observer.product

data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (a) (1): Access control
data.phrase:
//Standard: Access control. Implement technical policies and procedures for electronic information systems that maintain electronic protected health information to allow access only to those persons or software programs that have been granted access rights

datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*" and xdm.network.ip_protocol = "TCP"
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id

data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (a) (2): Unique user identification
data.phrase:
//(i) Unique user identification (Required). Assign a unique name and/or number for identifying and tracking user identity.

datamodel 
| filter xdm.event.type contains "*"
| filter xdm.source.host.hostname contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.event.operation, xdm.event.operation_sub_type, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.source.process.name, xdm.source.process.executable.path, xdm.observer.product

data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (b): Audit controls
data.phrase:
//Standard: Audit controls. Implement hardware, software, and.or procedural mechanisms that record and examine activity in information systems that contain or use electronic protected health information.

datamodel 
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type contains "*"
| fields xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type , xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.ipv4, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.port, xdm.target.host.hostname, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.user.username 
| limit 500

data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (c) (1): Implement policies or procedures to protect PHI
data.phrase:
//Standard: Integrity. Implement policies and procedures to protect electronic protected health information from improper alteration or destruction.

datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "XDR" | fields xdm.observer.*

data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (d): Person or entity authentication
data.phrase:
//Standard: Person or entity authentication. Implement procedures or entity seeking access to electronic protected health information is the one claimed.

datamodel | filter xdm.alert.original_alert_id ="kerberos_tgs_req" //krb_tgs_data record description
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_type = "PRINCIPAL" and xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_values contains "*"
| fields xdm.alert.original_alert_id, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_values, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.error_code, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.kdc_options, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.msg_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.padata_prefix, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.spn_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.spn_values, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.ticket_expiration, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.ticket_prefix

data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (e) (1): Transmission security
data.phrase:
//Standard: Transmission security. Implement technical security measures to guard against unauthorized access to electronic protected health information that is being transmitted over an electronic communications network.

datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*"
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id
